content: Someone else defending the rich from the fans. How about if you DNP after averaging more than 30 minutes a game, then you go on the injured list for a full week. Its all or nothing, you’re either injured or you’re not. Not just “tired.” This is literally what they get paid for. Are there any true stats that show injuries are up? Showing more injuries come from back to backs doesn’t prove anything when we don’t know about practice/minutes/workout regimens in relation.
